messages.content: Elizabeth Riches will fight the Tories' extreme Brexit and be a champion for our communities

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Elizabeth will be a pro-Europe MP, fighting the Tories forcing us out of Europe under the worst conditions
Elizabeth will campaign for investment in education and mental health

mentions.tacticalSituation: North East Fife, a constituency where the Tory analysis showed the Liberal Democrats as runaway leaders in last Thursday's [Council election] voting.

endorsements.endorsement: Only the Lib Dems can stop a hard Brexit
The Liberal Democrats could be the big winners.
North East Fife, a constituency where the Tory analysis showed the Liberal Democrats as runaway leaders in last Thursday's [Council election] voting.
